article: china urged local regulators to tighten controls on coal price increases to help power producers cope with rising fuel costs , the national development and reform committee -lrb- ndrc -rrb- said in a statement on thursday .
abstract: china to strengthen control on coal price increase
candidates: china urged local regulators to tighten controls on coal price increases.
the move will help power producers cope with rising fuel costs, the national development and reform committee said.
